values:
I think it'd be best for everyone to stay inside right now! The air out there might be poisonous, after all, and--

And, if we have any medical supplies or anything to help, <small>or, I don't know, I'm not quite sure how this works..</small> then please, let everyone know!

[text; LOCKED FROM VEGETA.] Citizens of Discedo: In an attempt to corner Vegeta-san and get him under control, Gohan-san, his father, and Yamcha-san are going to lead Vegeta-san away from the city, where he can do damage freely and not hurt anyone else. As such, it's best if you all stay inside of the city and tend to your wounded. I'll be trailing behind them to make sure their area is blocked off. [/LOCK.] [voice; japanese.] I don't know, Vegeta-san! You look pretty scrawny for someone who claims to be the prince of a bunch of weird monkey people! Dyeing your hair doesn't really change much! Trust me, I've seen it up close!

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH! No! No! No, please, god, someone tell me that it's just a nightmare! I--a-ah--no, no, come on, Momo, breathe, breathe! Ah.. You can't -- I can't-- Just. Relax. ... For anyone who was on the escort team, I need all of you on board for this. There are several parties already out there and on-site near where the satellite was, and we need to head out as well. As for anyone else, we need to be organized, working together, and more than anything -- we need to stay calm. Who is out there right now, and who is wiling to go out and help whether it involved transporting the injured, caring for them on the spot, or helping out at the clinic? I hear that there are doctors out in the field to help, but if there are any to spare, it would be best for the rest of that team to stay in the clinic so that we can clear the area of the injured and keep them in a more concentrated space, where they'll be able to receive better care and more monitored rest. And for anyone else who isn't trained in a medical field, I think it's best to have extra help at the clinic, and I'm more than sure that the doctors will need any help that they can get. Since the clinic is located in the high school, that is where I'll be taking any of the injured that I find! I'll be going back and forth between the two locations, so if anyone needs an extra hand in escorting the injured, please, do not hesitate to ask!

Excuse me! Please, someone, if anyone -- c-can tell me -- On the recent broadcast, creatures known as Hollows were mentioned. Now, I.. humans aren't supposed to see them, but.. Has anyone seen them? They range in size, but they are always masked, and come in several shapes and forms as well. If -- if anyone's seen them, please tell me where, and when -- And, ah! Vegeta-san! Can I speak with you?

URGENT. This is Hinamori Momo, Vice Captain of the Fifth D sending out a quick message to everyone on the network. While I'm unsure of just how violent these new creatures are, I'm volunteering to help anyone who needs it. If you're stranded, unarmed, or just need help getting to a safer place, do not hesitate to contact me. On that note, anyone who is willing to do the same should probably let everyone else know as well--and contact me, because if you're closer to someone than I am, I'll probably need your help. Outside of the residential area, the high school, and the church.. are there any other places that can serve as temporary shelters in case of an infestation? This city is not small, and I'm sure a few of you know a lot more about safer shelters than I do. Also, if anyone's dealt with these things before, I'd really appreciate any information on it. They're apparently dead, but they're not hollows.. and they're not spirits. I don't understand! Everyone else, please, stay inside and don't provoke them. Hinamori, out!

[she's hysterical, panting, shrieking as she seems to be set in a charge, holding her zanpakutou at ready, even though it has no life in it to speak of.] Aizen! AIZEN-TAICHOU! I'm going to kill you! I--[she jerks back, and the communicator is sent flying, landing a few feet away from her with a sharp thud.] A-Ahh! Don't! Get away from me! Don't touch me! Let me go, don't--! Gn! [she chokes on her own scream, her fight suddenly coming to a stop. She's crying uncontrollably, and a ruffle of cloth is heard; in hermind, his voice is calm and soothing, murmuring gentle explanations, and everything she's told herself since the day she came out of her coma. Everything makes sense when she hears him say it, and she moves to grasp onto him, sobbing.]

So, is.. anyone else interested in the escort team? With this critical weather coming in, we need as many people as we can get to assist and bring new arrivals to safety. So far, I have Shimbo-san and Mokona-kun for information and directions, but.. I need people out for field work, badly..! If it's not too much trouble, I mean.

<s>has anyone found</s>
<s>please</s>
<s>i really need</s>

I know that this is in high demand, but I was wondering if there has been any progress made in researching the location of the current chip..? I'll go through any screening process I need to go through to get mine out, because my kidou and zanpakutou would be really helpful, especially with this weather. I could help warm up the buildings! So, if anyone knows, or wants help with research, then I'm completely available for that!

So, <s>uh,</s> how is everyone else doing? Is 'Christmas' here, yet? 

<lj-cut text="private.">
i really, really, really

i'm having nightmares, and i can't talk to tobiume and it hurts so much whenever i touch my chest because the would is still there 

there was nothing they could do to get rid of it, really, but even if they had..

god, i

i just want to talk to tobiume again



i need her so much right now.</lj-cut>

<small>[ooc: strikes = unhackable!]

Oh! It's..

The first snow of the year.

Since there's apparently no remaining team for welcoming and helping newcomers, I think, if everyone is alright with it, that I'm going to start a new one. I need volunteers, at least five, to help me when it comes to locating new arrivals and physically getting those that need it to safety. Is anyone up for the job?

Tarble-san? How are you doing, so far? 

Things are.. getting strange, here! Is this what usually happens when chips are removed?! Does anyone out there need help? <small>This is bad..</small>

[her voice is nasally, but soft, her words coming out in a sort of concentrated, pre-planned fashion. Vauely, you can hear her sniffle.] I.. think I need to settle into an apartment, soon. Ane.. Anemone, was it? Uhm, would -- is the room still open? I promise, I'm a clean person and I wouldn't mess the place up at all! Also, I've been told of an escort team for new arrivals. I'd like to join that, so would anyone know who I'd need to talk to for it..?

A-ah! How did--

What are these..!?

Is.. is it in season for weird plants to grow, here? First the trees, now these.. what are they?

If you do not enter the tiger's cave, you will not catch it's cub. A long time ago actually, it hasn't been long, has it? Just one year ago, he someone I knew would quote proverbs on a daily basis. Whether it was to teach us a lesson or get on our nerves, this person was consistent, and we all knew that they were right. I still remember a good deal of the old sayings; in fact, I've been writing them down for some time, so that I wouldn't forget them. Thank you, Mimura-san, for helping me when I first arrived, as well as everyone who was concerned. I'm still searching for details on this place, though.. so if anyone could provide those, I'd be grateful. I have many, many questions, and they might become annoying but why am i even god, why am i so I'd really appreciate answers, if anyone can. These sakura trees.. they aren't in season. Tobiume still isn't talking. There can't be anything wrong; we've gone through so much already, and I can't think of a thing that Tobiume would be upset over--at least.. not something that would stop all of our actually, maybe maybe tobiume hates me now for not protecting rangiku maybe i've let tobiume down please please please talk to me tobiume i can't god, please, talk to me! I cant do this without you.

RANGIKU--! [she chokes on her words, her feet hitting the ground and audibly stumbling backwards until she regains her footing. Her breathing is quick, her voice is hoarse, and the? communicator shakes in her hands as she tries to reclaim her bearings.] Ha--Use this..? Use this--!? No! I don't have time! I--where am I?! I can't be here! Did they do this?! Why would they send me--Rangiku! I need to get home. Is - is anyone out there?! Hello?! Someone, answer me! Some.. [her breathing hitches in her throat, and she stumbles more - a low groan seems to rise and overpower her voice.] ... one.. Ah--! [the communicator drops from her hands and hits the ground with a rough thud; static overtakes the transmission for a second, as vague yelling is heard, before she screams, and seems to panic.] Ume--Burst--! Hel--! --kudou thirty-- NO--! [the transmission cuts as she shrieks, fizzling out into silence.]

Have any problems with the way Momo is played? Any good advice or suggestions for later development? Or, do you really just want to tell me how great I am at playing her? Awwww yeaah. Tell me here. All crit is totally welcome. ♥ Go nuts!
